div.p:
Vniuersis pateat per presentes Nos perpetuum Balliuos Consules et communitatem burgi de abirdene
fecisse constituisse nec non tenore presencium facere constituere et ordinare nostros delectos conburgenses
gilbertum menyes nostrum prepositum Johannem ruthirfurd militem Johannem cullane' andream cullane' Johannem
collisone Jacobum colisone et Johannem mar nostros veros legittimos commissarios dans et concedens
eisdem nostram plenariam potestatem pro nobis et Nomine nostro totam et integram' dimiditatem
omnium terrarum nostrarum de hessilheid' cum suis pertinenciis Jacente infra libertatem dicti burgi pro
forma pre manibus nobis soluendis nostro dilecto conburgensis patricio reid' dimittendum et arrendendum
pro terminis nonendecim Annorum ad honorabiles expenses et onera in prouisione recepcionis nostre
excellentisime regine scotorum Illustrissime Ceteraque omnia et singula in premissis faciendis
gerendis et excercendis que nos facere Possemus si Personaliter interessemus Promittens nos
Ratum gratum firmum et stabile habens et habiturum totum et quicquid dicti commissarij nostri
premissis nomine nostro rite duxerunt faciendum In cuius rei testimonium presentibus Sigillum nostrum
communione dicti burgi est appensum apud eundem decimo tercio de mensis maij anno Dominj j millesimo
quingnetesimo vndecimo et cetera

Be It kend' till ale men' be thir present lettrez ws Prouost Bailyeis counsaile and communite
of Aberdene oure awaile in that part seyne considerit and vnderstandin till haue sett and to formaill
lattyne ande be thir prsent lettres settis and' to formaile lattis till our traist neychtbouris Patry reid
burges of the said burgh all and' haill the half our landis of hessilheid witht thair pertinence liand'
within the fredome of the said burgh for all the termez of nyntene yeris ffor ane' certane
Some vsuall money of Scotlande pait till vs thankfully in nowmerit money in tym'
of the making of thir lettrez' to the furnessing pament and prouision' of the honorabill
costes expens' and chargis maid and to be maid in the ressaving of our Souerane lady the
queyne at hir first passage throu the Realme to the plesoure of hir gude grace and' for
common' proffit and weile of the gude towne of the quhilk Some of money in fule and haill
contentacioun' and pament of the formaile and girsom of the saide half landis of hessilhede
with the pertinens for ale the termes of nyntene yeris we hald ws weill' content and'
fulleli pait and discharges and quiet' clamys the said patry his ayres executouris and' assig
tharof ws our ayres Successoures executoures ande assignez now and foreuir To be
haldin and hed ale and' haill the said half landis of hessilheid with the pertinence to the
said patry his ayres ande assignes ane or may Induellaris within the said burgh'
with ale and sindrie pastores lesoures fredomes comoditeis asiamentis and proffitis pertenyng
or may pertene tharto the entray of the said patry his ayres or assignez ane or may salbe in
and with the said half landis of hessilheid' with the pertinence at the fest of Witsunday nixt ane
the Inmediat eftir follouing' the dait of thir lettrez' And frathinfurtht to continew in peciable'
Josing and breuking of the samyne quhill ale the termez of xix yeris haile and gidder
be fullely compleit and runnyng but ony Interruption' or brak of termez or yeris question'
Inpedement or demand' of his vs our Successouris aires assignez or ony vthires in our names
To be maid in the contrar and' we said prouost bailyeis counsale and communite oblis' ws our successoris
lelelie and treulie to warrand' keip and dorsand' ale and' haill the saide half landis of hessil
heid with thair pertinence to the said patry his ayres and assignez maile and grissum
fre for ale the termes of ix xix yeris as saide is be ale our landis and gudes aganys
ale deidlie al fraud and gile als input In witnessing of the quhilkis the commone
Seile of the saide burgh is appensit to thir lettrez' at the samyne the xiij day of the
moneth of maij the yer of god JM Vc Alewin yeris

Vniuersis pateat per presetes nostris prepositum balliuos Consules et communitatem burgi de Abirdene fecisse constituisse et
ordinasse necnon tenorem presencium facere constituere et ordinare nostros legittimis conburgensis gilbertum menyes nostrum
prepositum Johannem ruthirfurd' militem Johannem cullane andream cullane Johannem colison' Jacobum colison et Johannem
mar nostros veros et legit et legittimos commissarios dans et concedens eisdem nostram plenariam potestatem pro nobis
et Nomine nostro totas et Integras piscarias nostras dimidij Rethis de pott super aquam de Dee cum suis per
tinenciis assedandj et pro firma pre manibus nobis soluendis dimittendis et arrendendis pro terminis
decim Annorum ad honorabiles expensis et onera in prouisione recepcionis nostre Excellentissime regine
scotorum Illustrissime Ceteraque omnia alia et singula in premisse faciendum gerendum et excercendum que
nos facere possemus si personaliter interessemus Promittens nos ratum gratum firmum et stabile habens
et habiture tocium et quicquid dicti commissarij in premisse nomine nostro rite duxerint faciendum Int
In rei testimonium presentibus Sigillum communione dicti burgi est appensum apud eundem quinto die mensis
Anno dominj millesimo Quingentesimo Vndecimo et cetera

Be It kend' till ale men' be thir present lettres vs prouost bailyeis counsale and communite of Aberdene our
awaile in that part seyne considerit and vnderstandin to haue set and to for maile lattyn' and be thir
present lettres' settis to for maile lattis till our traist neychboure Jonhne andersone burges of
the said burgh ale and haile our fisscheingis of ane half netht of the Pott vppoun' the vatter of Dee
for ale the termez of Nyntene yeris for ane certane Some vusuall money of scotland pait till ws thank
fully in tyme of the making of thir present lettres to the furnessing and prouisione of the honorabile expens'
costis and chargis maid and to be maid in the ressaving of our Souerane lady the queyne at the
first passag throu the Realme to the plesoure of his gud grace for common' proffit and weile
of the gud towne The quhilk Some of money in full and haill Pament of the saide nynten'
yeris maile and girsum we hald ws content and pait ande dischargis and quietclamys' the
said Jonhne his ayres executouis and assignez now and foreuir To be haldin and hed all and
haill the said half nethis fisscheing with the pertinence to the said Jonhne his asyres and assignez
Induellaris of the said burgh with all ande sindrie fredomes commoditeis asiamentis and proffitis
pertenyng or may pertene thairto The Entray of the said Jonhne his ayres or assignes salbe
in and witht the said half nethis fischeing witht the pertinence salbe one the vigill of Sanct
androw in wintir nixt and Inmediate eftir follouinge the dait of thir lettres And frathinfurtht
to continew in peciable' Josin ande breuking the samyne quhile ale the termes of nyntene yeris
haile ande to giddir be fullely compleit and runnyne but ony Interrupcioun' or brek of termes
or yeris questioun' Impediment or demand of ws or our Successouris or ony vtheris to be maid
in the contrare Quhilk halfnethis fischeinge the saide Jonhne andersone hes in tak
to the said vigill And gif It happinnis the saide Jonhne his ayres or assignez to be Inquiet
wext or trublit in peciable' Josin ande breuking of the saide halfnethis fischeinge Induring the for
saide termes quharthrou he or thai may nocht peciable' Jois' thame as god forbeid Thane we bud
ande oblis' ws and our Successouris lelely and treuly to pay to the said Jonhne his ayres ande
assignes half ane' last of salmond' sufficient merchande gude of the richtuis bind of Aberden'
Ilkane yer' quhill thai Jois' the saide fischeingis peciable' and atour your Vniuersite sall wit
ws the saides prouost Bailyes consale and communite eftir the saide nyntene yersi be runnyne
to haue Set and to maile lattin ande be thir present lettres Settis and to maile lattis to the said
Jonhne his ayres Induellaris of the saide burgh all and haill the said halfnethis fischeingis
of the Pott with the pertinence for ale the termes of five yeris The said Jonhe ande his
ayres payand till ws ande our Successouris als mekle' maile and girsum as ony vther neychbour
pais for siclik tak Allanerlie Ande we said prouost bailyeis counsale and communite oblis'
ws and our Successouris lelely ande treulie to warrand' keip and defend' the saide
half nethis fischeinge with the pertinence to the saide Jonhn his ayres and assignes maile and
girsum fre for ale the termes of nyntene yeris as saide is be all our landis and gudes aganys
ale dedly In witnessing of the quhilkis we haue appensit our common Seill to thir lettres
At Aberdene' the fift day of the monetht of Maij the yer of god' JM Vc and xj yeris

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjo die mensis maij
anno quo supra

The said' day Androw stratone complenyeit to the prouost and balyeis that Jonhne of
mar balye ande normond' of leslie officiar hed brokin vp his durris
and tribulit his hous and takin avay his wescheale and gudis quhilkis thai
denyit and in continent with consent of batht the said partiis the said actionez
and tribulance was put to the determinacioun of thir personis burges of the said
burghe chosin in ane assis' that is to say Jonhne Colisone thomas Waus
Robert crag Jonhne blak Dauid fynne Dauid stevart Jonhne andirsone patry
rede Duncan fif Alexander malisone Androw meldrum gilbert litstar Androw lousone
thomez' Watsone William laysk Jonhne of murray Dauid Kintor Jonhne
of meldrum and Alexander burnat quhilkis riplie auisit the gret aithe suorne
the richtis and allegacionis witnes and preuis of batht the said partiis herde pro
ducit and vndirstandin fand' and deliuerit ale in ane voce concedand' the said
Jonhne mar' and Normond' leslie quyt of the durris vpstriking tribulance
and of ale wrang done to the said' Androw stratone his hous' wif ande
seruandis and of the wranguis' takin of his gudis be the moutht of the
said' Jonhne Colisone forspekar of the said assis'

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta Infra burgum de Aberdene in hospicio
gilbertj menyeis prepositi decimono die mensis maij Anno Dominj millesimquingentesimo
vndecimo

Thomas Waus Willelmus Wormet Willelmus colp Jacobus strathachin Andreas meldrum
malcomus crag Adam fif Andreas Kintor Andreas Waus Dauid' Kintor alexander
horne Duncanus craik Alexander burnat Andreas grig and Johnanes fechat burgenses
dictj burgj Jurati dicunt quos Karolus stevinson' patricius Robertj stevinson'
latoris presencium est propinquior Agnatus idem consanguineus ex parte patris Roberto
stevinson' filio et heredj quondam Johannis stevinsone burgensis dictj burgj patris suj
Et excessit etatem vigintj quinque Annorum Et est sue Rej prouidus et potens
idonec de administracione Rej aliene Et non est immediate successurus ipsi
Roberto si ipsum contigerit in fata decedere quia habet fratres germanos procreatos
legittimos vnientes Datis et clausis suis sigillo Andrea fif balliuo et sigillis quorundam
eorum quj Inquisicioni Interiore faciendum Anno die mense et loco prenotate

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo sexto
die mensis Maij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo vndecimo

The said day Marion' lundoris grantit that scho had ressaue fra Richerd
litster viij s' and vij d' of maile

Duncanus colisone Alexander gray patricius Reid' Johannes Andersone Willelmus
murray Dauid fynne Andreas stratone Willelmus chessame Johannes Kintor Johannes
Wilyeameson' Alexander roche thomas craufurd' gilbertus litster Johannes moir'
and Andreas meldrum Jurati dicunt quod quondam andreas smyth Incola dicti
burgj pater margarete smyth latricis presencium obijt vltimo vestitus et sasitus
vt de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis de vna terra Jacente infra
dictum burgum in vico viridj ex occidentali parte eiusdem vie regie qua Itur
ab ecclesia sancti nicholaij ad locum fratrum carmelitarum dicti burgj inter terram
thome gledstane ex boreali ex vna et terram gilberti mernoch ex australj
partibus ab altera et terram capellanorum collegij ecclesie parrochiali dicti burgj versus
occidens ad communionem viam regiam versus oriens Et quod dicta margareta est
legittima et propinquior heres dicti quondam andree patris suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis
Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum quinque solidos
solidos et valuit duos solidos tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de
supremo domino nostro rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus dicti
domini nostri Regis legittime per se ipsum decessum dicti quondam andree patris suj per spacium
trium mensum aut eocirca in defectu verj heredis Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis
datis et clausis

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Duncan Colison'
forspekar that Jonhne brabneir' sale refunde and pay tile Alexander gray
fyftene Schillingis gret for ane pety quarter of Salt as patry Red'
and vthiris merchandis for siclyk

The said' day andirsone was conuict' be ane suorne assis' Duncan
Colisone forspekar for the tribulance of tibby blinsele for the
quhilkis scho was in Amerciament of the court and tile amend' as law
wile and forbeir in tyme to Cum et cetera ande the assis' referrit the
amendis of the saide tribulance to the prouost and Counsale

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem pennultimo die
mensis maij Anno dominj et cetera quingentesimo vndecimo

The said day Elizibeth meldrum the relict' of vmquhile Johnne portar
lauchfully' warnit callit and nocht comperit tll haue ansuerit at the instance
of Wilyeame abirdour in amerciament of the court in defalt of presens

the said day Dauid couper grantit him awand' to Dauid couper patry
arthour xj s' quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The said day Johnne arthour in the Name of his wif was conuict' be ane
suorne assis' Wilyeame Wormet forspekar for the tribulance of Wilyeame abirdour
in word And the said Wilyeame was conuict' for the tribulance of the said wif
of Johne arthour in word' And athir of the said partijs till amend as law wil
and' forber in tyme tocum

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem secundo
die mensis Junij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo vndecimo

The said day Androw naughtie officiar grantit that he had intromettit
with ane land' man that aucht v stane of wol to androw litstar
and had' takin souerte of the said land man Thar the bailyeis chargeit
the said' Androw becaus he had intromettit with the said' man to entir
him one friday that nixt cummys to ansuer to the said androw litster
or thane to Remain him self within the tolbutht

The said' day Jonet coupland' oftymes callit warnit and nocht comperit
till haue ansuerit at the Instance of meg loremar for the wranguis'
withhalding fra hir of xxviij d' in amerciament of the court in defalt of presens and' that
was gevin for dome

Eodem die margareta loremar' fecit constituit creauit et nominauit ormand'
lesly suum procuratorem ad recipiendum et prosequendum a Joneta coupland'
xxviij s' monete scocie Et ad prosequendum dictam Jonetam pro dicta summa
si necesse fuerit Promittens se Ratum gratum et cetera

The said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' cuthberd' Jhonstone
forspekar that Johnne fynne cordonar sal content and pay to patrik Walcar
xv schillingis of siluer

The said day it was deliuerit be the said assis' that henry andersone
be his avin toung grant sall deliuer ane Reme of gud sufficient
papir to ser Johnne stirueling within terme of law

Thhe said day it was deliuerit be ane assis' cuthberd' Jhonstone' forspekar
that alexander bynne sall gif ane sufficient Reme of papir to henry andirson' for the
the reme of papir that the said henry bocht fra him and gef sere Johnne stirueling
or thane the money that the said henry gef the said alexander for the said papir
ressaue the samyn fra the said henry

Curia balliuorum de aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem sexto die mensis
Junij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo vndecimo

Eodem die georgeus tailyeour amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore patricij
lesly prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis arthour cuj emendabit vt Jura
volunt Et dictus Johannes arthour quitus fuit per dictam assisam pro perturbio
ipius georgej

Eodem die mariota Duncansone sponsa georgej tailyeoure amerciatur per
dictum assisam pro perturbio Johannis arthour cuj emendabit vt Jura
volunt Et dictus Johannes quytus de perturbio ipsius mariote

Eodem die alexander Kintor patricius arthour and Robertus arthour
conuictj fuerunt per assisam Juratam ex ore patricij lesly prelocutoris eiusdem
pro perturbio Johannis georgej talyour et mariote Duncanson' vxoris sue

The said day alexander mathousone tuk to preif on' friday that nixt cummys
that Wilyeame Walcar' tennend' of his land' in the gallougat tuk to vphald'
the dikis of the said land' to big thame

The said day Johnne arthour requirit georg tailyeour instantly
to Seill his chartir of the land' liand' in the vuirkirkgat quhilk
being selit and deliuerit to him he suld' deliuer the said georg his
money quhilk he had reddy thar nowmerit And the said georg
tuk to be auisit with the said chartir for viij dais and thareftir gif
ansuer' tharapone this day viij dais

The said day Elizibeth blinseile on' that ane part and andirson' one that
vthir part oblist thame be thar handis vphaldin the gret aitht suorne to
stand' and abid' at the deliuerance ordinance and decreit of Johnne
mar' and ser Dauy lyel chosin for the part of the said Elizibeth and Johnne
Kintor and Adam Weir for the part of the said and Johnne colison'
Odman anent the tribulance and offence done to the said elizibeth be
the said'
